events.title: Sunday Service
events.description: Join us for our weekly Sunday service filled with worship, prayer, and a powerful message.

events.title: Bible Study
events.description: Deepen your understanding of the scriptures with our interactive Bible study session.

events.description: A fun and engaging night for young believers to connect, worship, and grow together.
